[
  "def show_set_password_window(icon=None, item=None):\r\n    def save_new_password():\r\n        global PASSWORD\r\n        new_pass = entry.get().strip()\r\n        if new_pass:\r\n            PASSWORD = new_pass\r\n            save_config()\r\n            print(\"üîê Password updated.\")\r\n            win.destroy()\r\n\r\n    def toggle_password_visibility():\r\n        if show_var.get():\r\n            entry.config(show=\"\")\r\n        else:\r\n            entry.config(show=\"*\")\r\n\r\n    global tk_window\r\n    if tk_window and tk_window.winfo_exists():\r\n        tk_window.lift()\r\n        return\r\n\r\n    win = tk.Toplevel(root)\r\n    win.title(\"Set Server Password\")\r\n    win.geometry(\"300x180\")\r\n    win.resizable(False, False)\r\n\r\n    ttk.Label(win, text=\"Enter new password:\", font=(\"Segoe UI\", 11)).pack(pady=(10, 5))\r\n    \r\n    entry = ttk.Entry(win, show=\"*\", font=(\"Segoe UI\", 11))\r\n    entry.pack(pady=5, padx=20, fill=\"x\")\r\n    entry.insert(0, PASSWORD)\r\n\r\n    show_var = tk.BooleanVar(value=False)\r\n    show_checkbox = ttk.Checkbutton(win, text=\"Show Password\", variable=show_var, command=toggle_password_visibility)\r\n    show_checkbox.pack(pady=(0, 10))\r\n\r\n    ttk.Button(win, text=\"Save\", command=save_new_password).pack(pady=10)\r\n",
  "Google",
  "offered",
  "Google offered ",
  "n = 5\na=[0,1]\nfor i in range(n):\n    a.append((a[-1]+a[-2]))\nprint(a)\n",
  "IoT Gesture System (Ultrasonic Sensors) ÔÇ∑ Developed a gesture-based control system using Arduino ultrasonic sensors and Python. ÔÇ∑ Implemented real-time distance sensing with noise handling and timeout safety. ÔÇ∑ Built a Tkinter GUI to simulate keyboard inputs (e.g., media control, custom inputs). ÔÇ∑ Enabled customizable key bindings, sensor toggles, and profile switching. ÔÇ∑ Used moving average filtering and serial communication for smooth, accurate gesture detection. "
